name: announcer_diretide_miniboss_mid
text: A horrible creature now stalks the Middle Lane!
text_simple: a horrible creature now stalks the middle lane

name: announcer_diretide_miniboss_bot
text: A foul fiend threatens the Bottom Lane!
text_simple: a foul fiend threatens the bottom lane

name: announcer_poem_verse_01
text: Tis the season of the Dire, Darktide rising ever higher, Greevils hatching from Roshan, Radiant's power is almost gone!
text_simple: tis the season of the dire darktide rising ever higher greevils hatching from roshan radiants power is almost gone

name: announcer_poem_verse_02
text: When the river red does run, with the blooding of the sun, gather candy in its spate, lest Roshan you aggravate!
text_simple: when the river red does run with the blooding of the sun gather candy in its spate lest roshan you aggravate

name: announcer_poem_verse_03
text: Should you offer nothing sweet, he will feed on hero's meat, Dire or Radiant matters not, best be ready if you're caught!
text_simple: should you offer nothing sweet he will feed on heros meat dire or radiant matters not best be ready if youre caught

name: announcer_poem_verse_04
text: Once Roshan has had his fill, candy then afflicts his will: maddened into sugary fits, he will rage until he quits!
text_simple: once roshan has had his fill candy then afflicts his will maddened into sugary fits he will rage until he quits

name: announcer_poem_verse_05
text: Dire and Radiant must unite, with a common end in sight, Roshan will not yield to five, ten must join if they would thrive.
text_simple: dire and radiant must unite with a common end in sight roshan will not yield to five ten must join if they would thrive

name: announcer_poem_verse_06
text: If Roshan, your team defeats, Diretide offers up its treats, eggs and essence do abound... After that another round!
text_simple: if roshan your team defeats diretide offers up its treats eggs and essence do abound after that another round
